sense.def:
An orbit
je krivulja, po kateri potuje predmet, ki kroži okoli planeta, Lune ali Sonca.

seg.quote: How much does it cost to put a satellite into orbit?

sense.def:
To orbit a planet, a moon, or the sun
pomeni gibati se okoli planeta, Lune ali Sonca.

seg.quote: ...the first American astronaut to orbit in space.
